title: GLASS Ending Explained - Unbreakable and Split Connections
author: Think Story
comment: Try saying shyamalanauniverse three times fast!
The 3rd act of Glass is one of the craziest things I've ever seen. I ultimately kind of loved it.

TS, that was epic! You don’t waste time and get right to the point. I wasn’t a fan of the ending only because “Unbreakable” was a favorite of mine and my best friend. And he died two weeks ago, we had talked about seeing “Glass” together. But I appreciate your video and you did a great job even without scenes from the movie. Thanks.

Going to be on my way to see this in a few hours with my wife. Good thing movie spoilers doesn't bother me much. Still isn't the same as seeing it for myself. So far I've heard good things about Glass.
I genuinely loved the movie, it was seriously epic.
description:
Shyamalan's latest, "Glass", provides a twist ending so I break it down and explain its meaning as well as its connection to Unbreakable and Split.
